title: Teaching Professional Development Program Based on Communities of Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary education teaching methods and language arts instruction experience
context.additional_context: Participants engage in self-directed learning in non-real-time online environments, with an emphasis on collaborative activities with peer instructors

learning_goals: Participants can apply three research-based language teaching strategies to their own classes through eight weeks of community of practice activities
Participants can develop an action plan to improve their teaching methods based on peer observations and feedback from fellow instructors
Participants can write a report explaining effective lesson design principles for language subjects by analyzing shared reading materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
